data.title: Illinois Governors Conference on Travel & Tourism
data.meta_description: Business Development Manager - Sports Division, Northstar Meetings Group
data.meta_site_name: Illinois Governors Conference on Travel & Tourism
data.text: Michelle Lupo is a business development manager within Northstar Meetings Group’s Sports Division, covering Midwest, West Coast and International territories. A recent transplant to Los Angeles, Lupo loves exploring the city, practicing yoga and pursuing her art and design business part-time. Honoring her passion for connecting the dots for her customers, She is currently enrolled in Purdue University’s online Business Administration program.
